function_call.name: classify_risks_PESTLE
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Restricted spaces for aerobic exercise","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Engagement in heavy aerobic and resistance training programs without adaptation","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Participating in physical activity during a systemic viral infection","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inactivity due to quarantine and social isolation","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of physical activity diversity","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Uncontrolled progression in exercise intensity","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of physical activity due to quarantine and social isolation.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Overexertion and injury from improper exercise technique or excessive activity","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of motivation to engage in regular exercise due to social isolation and quarantine","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Contagious transmission of the novel sars-cov-2 coronavirus from animal species to humans","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Recombination events in bat and pangolin-origin coronaviruses leading to the generation of new recombinants","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential for mutations and evolution of the sars-cov-2 virus in human and animal hosts","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"High similarity between sars-cov-2 and bat coronaviruses","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"High mortality rates of known coronaviruses mers-cov, sars-cov","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Asymptomatic and flu-like symptoms of sars-cov-2","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Disrupted circadian sleep-wake rhythm leading to decreased immune defense","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Manifestation of covid-19 as pneumonia and acute respiratory distress syndrome","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of knowledge on procedures to prevent the spread of sars-cov-2","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Human-to-human transmission through droplets, aerosols, and direct contact","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inhalation of aerosols containing pathogens","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Transmission through direct or indirect contact with infected people or contaminated surfaces","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of knowledge about the vital concentration of sars-cov-2 necessary to infect a human from inanimate surfaces","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of specific diagnostic techniques for early detection of sars-cov-2 virus","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate screening protocols and guidelines for covid-19 testing","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of serologic tests for covid-19","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of specific treatments and vaccines for coronavirus infections","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of experimental and unapproved drugs for covid-19 treatment","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of drugs in treatment of sars-cov-2 infection","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Off-label use of favipiravir for sars-cov-2 effects and long-term impacts.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate evaluation of drugs for covid-19 therapy","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Spread of sars-cov-2 in the built environment","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of compliance with quarantine and surveillance control and measurement of body temperature","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"High number of operators within confined environments","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate sanitization procedures","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Close contacts between work colleagues or other washing leading to transmission of sars-cov-2","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Close contact with individuals suffering from acute respiratory infections","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Touching of eyes, nose, mouth, and genitals with unwashed hands","category":"Public health depending on the model and size of aerosol particles","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of inappropriate face masks in environments potentially contaminated with
